outputs.output_descr:
The reduction of explosive risk to communities by upgrading safety disposals to ammunition storage sites and by the environmentally benign demilitarization of surplus conventional ammunition and explosives.  This also supports national and international counter-proliferation strategies.
	The reduction of counter-proliferation risks through the development of safe and secure conventional ammunition storage infrastructure and management systems in accordance with the internationally recognized standards and OSCE best practices. 
	The improvement of capacities for safe demilitarization of surplus ammunition.

project_descr: Increasing Public Support for Serbia's Participation in Peace Support Operations (PSOs)
project_title: Capacity Development Programme for MOD Serbia
